alert.note: Alert for Custer; Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:03PM MDT until August 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CUSTER...NORTH CENTRAL OGLALA LAKOTA AND SOUTH CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 502 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Badlands National Park, or 35 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Scenic, Red Shirt, Sheep Mountain Table, and southwestern Badlands National Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
